1.text: Wash your hands when they are dirty.

2.text: Make sure to be washing for at least 20-30 seconds.

3.text: Get your hands wet with warm or cold water.

4.text: Apply enough hand soap to cover your hands.

5.text: Interlace your fingers to clean in between them.

6.text: Hold onto your thumb and rotate your other hand around it.

7.text: Rub your palms with the tips of your fingers.

9.text: Dry your hands with a clean towel.

10.text: Use a towel to turn off the faucet.

11.text: Decide if hand sanitizer is appropriate.

12.text: Apply a coin-sized amount of hand sanitizer to one hand.

13.text: Rub your hands together until the sanitizer evaporates.
